# Spell Turning
## Overview
**Aura** strong abjuration; **CL** 13th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 100,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

Up to three times per day on command, this simple platinum band automatically reflects the next nine levels of spells cast at the wearer, exactly as if *[[Spell Turning (Spell)|spell turning]]* had been cast upon him.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Spell Turning (Spell)|spell turning]]*

**Cost** 50,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 483
